DocAttribute.Name: FamilyName
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name by which the family identity of the person may be recognized. > NOTE  Depending on geographical location and culture, family name may appear either as the first or last component of a name.

DocAttribute.Name: GivenName
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name by which a person is known within a family and by which he or she may be familiarly recognized. > NOTE  Depending on geographical location and culture, given name may appear either as the first or last component of a name.

DocAttribute.Name: MiddleNames
DocAttribute.Documentation: Additional names given to a person that enable their identification apart from others who may have the same or similar family and given names. > NOTE  Middle names are not normally used in familiar communication but may be asserted to provide additional identification of a particular person if necessary. They may be particularly useful in situations where the person concerned has a family name that occurs commonly in the geographical region.

DocAttribute.Name: PrefixTitles
DocAttribute.Documentation: The word, or group of words, which specify the person's social and/or professional standing and appear before his/her names.

DocAttribute.Name: SuffixTitles
DocAttribute.Documentation: The word, or group of words, which specify the person's social and/or professional standing and appear after his/her names.

DocAttribute.Name: Addresses
DocAttribute.Documentation: Postal and telecommunication addresses of a person. > NOTE  A person may have several addresses.

DocAttribute.Name: EngagedIn
DocAttribute.Documentation: The inverse relationship to IfcPersonAndOrganization relationships in which IfcPerson is engaged.

DocWhereRule.Name: IdentifiablePerson
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Requires that the identification or/ and the family name or/ and the given name is provided as minimum information.

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidSetOfNames
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If middle names are provided, the family name or/ and the given name shall be provided too.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT EXISTS(MiddleNames) OR EXISTS(FamilyName) OR EXISTS(GivenName)
